unnormalised: Okay, spill the chai! Bollywood's brewing again, and you know I've got the piping hot gossip fresh off the tava.
normalised: Okay, spill the chai! Bollywood's brewing again, and you know I've got the piping hot gossip fresh off the tava.

unnormalised: First up, whispers are saying Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt might be planning a vacay to the Maldives…again! Apparently, someone spotted their entourage loading up on sunscreen and oversized sunglasses at the Mumbai airport. Let’s see if they’ll finally confirm those baby rumors swirling around since, like, forever. Maybe a cute family photo session on those white sands is in the cards? We can only hope!

unnormalised: Then there's Isha Ambani's Diwali party drama! Word on the street is that Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal arrived separately! Cue the gasps! Did someone forget their date? Or is it all just clever PR to keep us guessing? Honestly, my desi heart can't handle this suspense. My sources (aunties at the local grocery store, mostly) say there was palpable tension in the air. Take it with a pinch of salt, folks.

unnormalised: Speaking of drama, remember that whole Hrithik Roshan-Kangana Ranaut saga? Well, Kangana is at it again, allegedly taking potshots at someone "nepo kid" in her upcoming film. Everyone's convinced it's a thinly veiled reference to someone prominent from the Dharma Productions camp. Talk about throwing shade!

unnormalised: And for those of you who thought SRK was just chilling after Pathaan's mega-success, think again! Rumours suggest he's already deep into pre-production for Dunki 2, the sequel to his Rajkumar Hirani collaboration. Locations being scouted include places around Delhi Uni (Delhi University) to give it that authentic feel. He really has no plans to slow down.

unnormalised: Finally, spotted Jahnvi Kapoor grabbing jalebis outside Gaiety Galaxy in Bandra. Relatable queen! Maybe she needed a sugar rush after a tough workout session or just wanted to feel normal! That’s all for now, folks. Stay tuned for more masala from the Bollywoodverse!
